# Checking for Normality
```{python}
sns.histplot(data=df, x="paranoia")
```

```{python}
sns.histplot(data=df, x="bdi")
```

```{python}
sns.histplot(data=df, x="stait")
```

```{python}
sns.histplot(data=df, x="stais")
```

None of the histograms show a normal distribution so we will be using non-Parametric tests.

```{python}
sns.scatterplot(data=df, x=df['paranoia'], y=df['bdi'])
```
